description:
With the help of Deneimon, Haru and the others acquire App Drive Duos, and head to the Appmon Graveyard to save Yujin! What is the secret power hidden inside their new Drives?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Power: The App Drive Duo!
Arata na Chikara! Appli Drive Duo!
新たな力! アプリドライヴDUO!
